title: Is Azerbaijan a top tourist destination? - Quora

response.answer_text: The best attraction of Azerbaijan is surely its element-rich landscape. They don’t call it the ‘Land of Fire’ for nothing. Even in the heart of Baku City, the illuminated, dancing Flame Towers are truly symbolic.  From the Caspian Sea (great for a swim in summer), to Yanar Dag (the eternally-burning hillside natural gas fire) or the bubbling mud volcanoes. Everywhere one ventures, there is evidence of the commodity that fuels the opulence, with jack-up drilling rigs just a stone’s throw from the beach, and nodding donkeys pumping away at the roadside.    I have also written a more detailed, illustrative answer on this topic: Sable de Oliveira's answer to Do you like Azerbaijan? [Images: original]
